- City Hall/Computer > NRaas > Retuner > Settings > General > By Tunable XML > Sims3.Gameplay.Situations > MascotIntroSituation > kCameraCenterOnLotTime > 0 (Default:2)
- City Hall/Computer > NRaas > Retuner > Settings > General > By Tunable XML > Sims3.Gameplay.Situations > MascotIntroSituation > kDoCameraZoom > False
- City Hall/Computer > NRaas > Retuner > Settings > General > By Tunable XML > Sims3.Gameplay.Situations > MascotIntroSituation > kHoursToIdle > 2 (Default:1)
